tutorial.speak:
If the church has configured giving, you can donate to your church directly from the B1 mobile or web app. You will receive two different views depending on if you are donating as a guest.
Or while logged in.
You can choose whether you wish to make a one-time
or recurring donation.
Next enter your name an email address. If you are making a one-time donation, you can choose to leave these fields blank and donate anonymously. However, they are required for recurring donations so you can edit them later. Be sure to also check the box to confirm you are human.
Next you will enter your credit or debit card information. You can also choose to save this information for future donations.
Next you will enter the amount you wish to donate and which fund it should go to.
If you wish you can donate to multiple funds with a single transaction.
B1 does not charge any fees, however the payment gateway your church uses such as Stripe or PayPal may charge a processing fee. The amount of this is shown and you have the option to donate extra to cover this fee so the church receives the full amount you intended. This is optional.
Finally, click submit and you will receive a confirmation of your donation.
